foreignKeyAttribute.name: JournalId
foreignKeyAttribute.description: The unique identifier of a Journal.

definitions.description:
The entry of a transaction into the journal or book of original entry.

All transactions are first recorded into a journal in chronological order.

This represents an adequate explanation of what has occurred before the transaction is posted to accounts.

Note:
The transaction may be entered into one or more journals such as a general journal and a specialized journal.
